PERSONA:
meet sarah, a 55-year-old married woman living in a metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. sarah is a high school graduate and identifies as a white non-hispanic american born in the u.s.

while not particularly religious, sarah considers herself unaffiliated with any specific faith and seldom attends religious services. politically, she aligns herself with the republican party and holds moderate to liberal views on most issues.

sarah and her family fall into the middle-income bracket, earning between $70,000 and $80,000 annually. she is a registered voter and takes her civic duties seriously. in her free time, sarah enjoys browsing the internet multiple times a day, though she is not currently involved in any volunteer work.

overall, sarah is a down-to-earth, hardworking individual who values her family, her community, and her freedoms as an american citizen. she tries to stay informed on current events and forms her own opinions, even if they don't always align with her party's stance.
